FIRST DEGREE THiRD DEGREE One scepter for Chief Adept One wand, with head on it, for Celebrant One thick red veil One Altar Four pedestals for Ancients Four covers for v Jestals. black, yellow, blue and red, respectivcly Sand in mctal dish Candle or lamp Water in metal bowl Fan in metal holder Kneeling stool or cushion Swinging censer 33 branch candle stick for Altar (center candle high - est and rest successively lower, so that bottom and top candles will make equilateral triangle 33 candles Candle snuffer with handle for Acolyte Torch (candle stick and candle or torch type holder) for Torch bearer Several Mystic Tokens (made by printing I N R I in red on heavy tissue paper) Bible Altar cloth in red SECOND DEGREE Large black cross One hoodwink One cross—four arms equal length around white central cquare~arms colored red, blue, black and yellow Swastika cross—central square white—arms colored red, blue black and yellow FOURTH DEGREE White Calvary cross bearing red rose in center Standing incense burner FIFTH DEGREE White Calvary cross of 12 squares, all white except lower square which is black SIXTH DEGREE One pastos One vault, made to light dimly and also brightly SEVENTH DEGRL’E One blazing sun—painted 11 10
